tasks.task: The transcript mentions the rehabilitation of over 150 kilometers of canals. For a person working on that, tasks would include canal inspection, repairs, and maintenance. But since this is a large-scale project, perhaps not individual tasks. However, they must be maintained regularly, so daily/small holdinglevel maintenance would be required. So my initial MAINTASKs cover that.

at the start of each main task with the subtasks listed below, this structure would meet the requirement. Each main task is a general category, broken down into specific subtasks. The irrigation system tasks cover operation and maintenance, farming tasks include all crop-related activities, and road maintenance takes care of keeping access routes in good condition.
